select id,username,create_date,title,`type` from boot_sys_message where del_flag = '0'
and username like concat('%',#{qo.username},'%')
and title like concat('%',#{qo.title},'%')
and ( ${qo.sqlFilter} )
order by create_date desc
SELECT a.title,a.content from boot_sys_message a where a.id = #{id}

SELECT b.id,a.title,a.create_date from boot_sys_message a join boot_sys_message_detail b on b.message_id = a.id where a.del_flag = '0' and b.read_flag = '0' and b.user_id = #{userId} order by a.create_date desc
mapper.update: update boot_sys_message_detail set read_flag = '1' where id = #{id}
